SEARCH
Package Handlers

Class Intermediary

java.lang.Object
Handlers.Intermediary
public class Intermediary extends Object
This class works as a connector between all the classes and is used to avoid working directly with files.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(String email, User user) throws org.json.JSONException
      Updates a user in the map of users, with a security check if the user's email changes (email is used as the key).
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user
      user - an object of the User class to be modified
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if the value is non-finite number or if the key is null

      Throws:

    • searchFood

      public Food searchFood(int foodID) throws FoodNotInMapException
      Searches for a food object in the food map.
      Parameters:
      foodID - the ID of the food to search for
      Returns:
      An instance of the Food class with the information of the found meal.
      Throws:
      FoodNotInMapException - If the meal does not exist in the map.

    • searchUser

      public User searchUser(String email) throws UserNotInMapException
      Searches for a user object in the user map.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user to search for
      Returns:
      An instance of the User class with the information of the found user.
      Throws:
      UserNotInMapException - If the user does not exist in the map.
